name.es: Tofu que vuela, a la cazuela

description.fr: Vaincre tous les Tofus. \--- {%FightTurnEnded} Les {Summoning:474,plural:other!} prennent leur {PropertyEffect:15[ENVOL]}. \--- Lorsqu'ils déclenchent un {#landing}\_: S'{PropertyEffect:1[ASSOMMENT]}.
description.en: Defeat all the Tofus. \--- {%FightTurnEnded} The {Summoning:474,plural:other!} take {PropertyEffect:15[FLIGHT]}. \--- When they trigger a {#landing}: {PropertyEffect:1[STUN]} themselves.
description.es: Vencer a todos los tofus. \--- {%FightTurnEnded} Los {Summoning:474,plural:other!} levantan el {PropertyEffect:15[VUELO]}. \--- Cuando activan un {#landing}: Quedan {PropertyEffect:1[ATURDIDOS]}.
description.de: Alle Tofus besiegen. \--- {%FightTurnEnded} Die {Summoning:474,plural:other!} {PropertyEffect:15[HEBEN AB]}. \--- Wenn sie eine {#landing} auslösen: Werden sie {PropertyEffect:1[BETÄUBT]}.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Tofus. \--- {%FightTurnEnded} Os {Summoning:474,plural:other!} levantam {PropertyEffect:15[VOO]}. \--- Quando eles ativam um {#landing}: Ficam {PropertyEffect:1[ATORDOADOS]}.
